sentence: Why was the scarecrow promoted? he was outstanding in his field.
explanation: The word field refers to an area of open land, especially one planted with crops. It also refers to a particular branch of study or professional activity.
first_new_sentence: The farmer cultivated a vast field of corn this season.
second_new_sentence: She decided to pursue a career in the medical field to help others.
